Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the town of Plattsburgh
Summary: Authorizes an occupancy tax in the town of Plattsburgh, not to exceed five percent of the per diem rental rate for each room.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing an occupancy tax in the town of Plattsburgh
